label: qimr-somatic-sub

inputs.doc: Forward reads produced as a part of a paired-end sequencing experiment. Multiple file inputs when libraries are pooled across >1 lanes
Reverse reads produced as a part of a paired-end sequencing experiment. Multiple file inputs when libraries are pooled across >1 lanes

steps.label: samblaster
steps.doc: First deduplication step. At read group. Step mostly performed.

steps.label: read-group-merge (picard)
steps.doc: Merge flow-cell lanes for an individual.

outputs.doc: Text file containing summaries of duplicate metrics.
Deduped, merged and sorted bam file.

inputs.doc:
Features classified as bait, fill, shoulder regions.

Bait - library capture sites.
FIll - sequences nowhere near the targets.
Target - defined by the pipeline.
Shoulder - region around the target - shoulder
